name: static
description: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being paralyzed.  Pokémon that are immune to electric-type moves can still be paralyzed by this ability.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, there is a 50% chance that encounters will be with an electric Pokémon, if applicable.
short_description: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.
